description: Superpositions of cycles of order n of the groups S_2 and D_n.
references: F. Harary and E. M. Palmer, Graphical Enumeration, Academic Press, NY, 1973, p. 171.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: E. M. Palmer and R. W. Robinson, Enumeration under two representations of the wreath product, Acta Math., 131 (1973), 123-143.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
